Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-29040 affecting package tpm2-tss for versions less than 2.4.6-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-29040 affecting package tpm2-tss for versions less than 2.4.6-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package tpm2-tss is earlier than 2.4.6-4, affected by CVE-2024-29040
